description: Wisdom goddess sprite configurations mapped to PixelLab sprite folders

wisdomGoddesses.name: Athena
wisdomGoddesses.description: Dignified figure in flowing white robes, owl perched on shoulder, holding scrolls of ancient wisdom

wisdomGoddesses.name: Saraswati
wisdomGoddesses.description: Serene goddess seated on lotus, veena instrument in hand, books floating around her in divine light

wisdomGoddesses.name: Thoth
wisdomGoddesses.description: Ibis-headed deity with reed pen and papyrus, scales of knowledge balanced in ethereal hands

wisdomGoddesses.name: Odin
wisdomGoddesses.description: Cloaked wanderer with single burning eye, ravens Huginn and Muninn whispering secrets. Perpetually irritated at being grouped with "goddesses" in this registry.

wisdomGoddesses.name: Sophia
wisdomGoddesses.description: Ethereal being of pure light, face shifting between forms, crystalline structures forming her crown

wisdomGoddesses.name: Seshat
wisdomGoddesses.description: Leopard-skin clad goddess with star headdress, notching every discovery into the eternal record
